briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of Benralizumab Added to High-dose Inhaled Corticosteroid Plus LABA in Patients With Uncontrolled Asthma
officialTitle: A Multicentre, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel Group, Placebo-controlled, Phase III Efficacy and Safety Study of Benralizumab (MEDI-563) Added to High-dose Inhaled Corticosteroid Plus Long-acting β2 Agonist in Patients With Uncontrolled Asthma
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Benralizumab reduces the number of asthma exacerbations in patients who remain uncontrolled on high doses of ICS-LABA.

primaryOutcome.measure: Annual Asthma Exacerbation Rate in Adult and Adolescent Patients With Uncontrolled Asthma for Eosinophils >=300/uL
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Immediately following the first administration of study drug through Study Week 48.
